changeSet.sql: update work set work_type = 'ARTISTIC_PERFORMANCE' where work_type in('CARTOON_COMIC','FILM_MOVIE','LIVE_PERFORMANCE','MUSICAL_RECORDING','PAINTING','PHOTOGRAPH','TELEVISION_RADIO');
update work set work_type = 'BOOK_CHAPTER' where work_type in('CHAPTER_ANTHOLOGY');
update work set work_type = 'BOOK_REVIEW' where work_type in('REVIEW');
update work set work_type = 'CONFERENCE_PAPER' where work_type in('CONFERENCE_PROCEEDINGS');
update work set work_type = 'DATA_SET' where work_type in('DATABASE','MAP_CHART','RAW_DATA');
update work set work_type = 'DISSERTATION' where work_type in('DISSERTATON_ABSTRACT', 'DISSERTATION');
update work set work_type = 'ENCYCLOPEDIA_ENTRY' where work_type in('ENCYCLOPEDIA_ARTICLE');
update work set work_type = 'MAGAZINE_ARTICLE' where work_type in('EDITORIAL','MAGAZINE_ARTICLE','PERIODICALS');
update work set work_type = 'NEWSLETTER_ARTICLE' where work_type in('NEWSLETTER');
update work set work_type = 'ONLINE_RESOURCE' where work_type in('DIGITAL_IMAGE','ELECTRONIC_ONLY','SOFTWARE');

update work set work_type = 'OTHER' where work_type in('ADVERTISEMENT','AUDIOVISUAL','BIBLE','BROCHURE','COMPONENTS','COURT_CASE','EMAIL','FEDERAL_TESTIMONY','INTERVIEW','LEGAL','LETTER','MAILING_LIST','MANUSCRIPT','NEWSGROUP','NON_PERIODICALS','OTHER','PAMPHLET','PRESSRELEASE','RELIGIOUS_TEXT','SCHOLARLY_PROJECT');

update work set work_type = 'STANDARDS_AND_POLICY' where work_type in('CONGRESSIONAL_PUBLICATION','EXECUTIVE_ORDER','FEDERAL_BILL','FEDERAL_REPORT','FEDERAL_RULE','FEDERAL_STATUTE','GOVERNMENT_PUBLICATION','STANDARDS');
update work set work_type = 'SUPERVISED_STUDENT_PUBLICATION' where work_type in('THESIS');
update work set work_type = 'UNDEFINED' where work_type is NULL;
update work set work_type = 'WORKING_PAPER' where work_type in('REPORTS_WORKING_PAPERS');
